intro: Gnidia stellatifolia, commonly known as the star-leaved gnidia, is a South African plant belonging to the family Rhamnaceae. It is characterized by its distinctive star-shaped leaves, which are opposite and have a soft, velvety texture. Gnidia stellatifolia is also valued for its ornamental appeal and is sometimes cultivated in gardens.
